quest.name: Double Dealing
journal: Staelwyrn worries his sack of oranges will not reach the La Thagran Checkpoint as planned.

Sevrin has made off with a sack of oranges with the intention of fencing it to goblins. Staelwyrn bids you seek out Sevrin and cast /doubt on his actions, that he might be compelled to do the right thing.

Sevrin openly admits to have taken the oranges for his own purposes, but he is not concerned with being found out at the moment. His deal with the goblins has gone awry, and his partners in crime are in trouble. He asks that you help them out of their jam.
You have saved Sevrin's mates from an unfortunate fate at the hands of the goblin muggers. Inform Sevrin about their well-being, and remind him about the sack of oranges he appropriated.

Sevrin is grateful to you for saving his henchmen, but is not apologetic for the attempted theft or his cowardice. Not wishing to start another fight, however, he grants you leave to take what you came for. Retrieve the sack of oranges.
You have acquired the oranges. See them to their rightful recipient, Ossine at the La Thagran Checkpoint.
Judging by Ossine's reaction, this is not the first time Sevrin has attempted a stunt like this. Return to Summerford Farms and relay to Staelwyrn all that has transpired.

Once again, Staelwyrn is appreciative of your honest efforts. He also bemoans the fact that Sevrin's disloyalty may be beyond repairing. You are duly warned to keep an eye on the delinquent whenever he is around.
objectives: Confront Sevrin and cast /doubt on his actions.
Deliver the sack of oranges to Ossine at the La Thagran Checkpoint.
Report to Staelwyrn at Summerford Farms.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”

dialogue.name: STAELWYRN
dialogue.text: Pains me to say, but all the gil in the world can't buy loyalty. There are some, like you, who can be trusted. But then there are others...

dialogue.name: STAELWYRN
dialogue.text: Until now, I've had no choice but to rely on that charlatan Sevrin, even though I am full aware he's been doin' shady deals behind my back. More than once I've heard tell of improper tradin' with goblins.

dialogue.name: STAELWYRN
dialogue.text: I wouldn't be the least surprised if that were happenin' right now. Not a bell ago, a sack of oranges vanished, as did Sevrin. I want you to find and confront the bastard for me, Surname. I'm sure there's wrongdoin' afoot, so be sure to doubt anythin' that comes out of his mouth.

dialogue.name: SEVRIN
dialogue.text: Bloody hells! I'm up the strait without a paddle!

dialogue.name: SEVRIN
dialogue.text: What's this now? Staelwyrn sent you for the oranges? Huh... So the old bugger had known all this time... Argh, what does it matter anyway?

dialogue.name: SEVRIN
dialogue.text: Listen, you're one o' those goody-goody adventurer types, right? Go rescue me mates from those double-dealin' goblins! They're just over yonder by the bonfire.

dialogue.name: SEVRIN
dialogue.text: You save me mates and, by the Navigator, you'll have your sack o' scurvy snacks!

dialogue.name: AYLMER
dialogue.text: I owe you one. Would've gotten away meself if not fer Sevrin shovin' me aside.

dialogue.name: EYRIMHUS
dialogue.text: Sevrin sent you? Hah! The way he flew out of here, I was sure he'd sold us down the river!

dialogue.name: SDHODJBI
dialogue.text: Textless

dialogue.name: SOZAIRARZAI
dialogue.text: If you hadn't come, my dodo would've been cooked! Mmm...cooked dodo.

dialogue.name: SEVRIN
dialogue.text: You saved me mates, and for that, I owe you.

dialogue.name: SEVRIN
dialogue.text: S'pose I should be ashamed I couldn't clean up my own mess...

dialogue.name: SEVRIN
dialogue.text: ...But a pirate knows no shame! I've no qualms about goin' back on my word! I'm only givin' you this sack 'cause I like the cut of your jib. Take it to Ossine, an' send him my regards.

dialogue.name: OSSINE
dialogue.text: What have we here? A delivery from Summerford Farms, and as scheduled? Hah! There's a first time for everything!

dialogue.name: OSSINE
dialogue.text: Well, look at that... Not a single one missing, either! About the only things not here are those bagmen, and I don't miss them one bit.

dialogue.name: OSSINE
dialogue.text: Here's Staelwyrn's payment in full. With you, I can trust it'll reach him!

dialogue.name: TALK
dialogue.text: Textless

dialogue.name: STAELWYRN
dialogue.text: Back in one piece! That's a relief. How did you fare, Surname?

dialogue.name: STAELWYRN
dialogue.text: Ah, this is what I was aimin' for! Looks to be all I was owed, all right. Though, I'd be tellin' you false if I claimed I had not held out more hope for Sevrin.

dialogue.name: STAELWYRN
dialogue.text: I was even willin' to overlook the skimmin' off the top, but to sell us all short in favor of those godsforsaken goblins... <sigh>

dialogue.name: STAELWYRN
dialogue.text: You'd do well to mind yourself around that two-gil cheat. If he'd leave his own mates for dead, there's no tellin' what he'd do to you.

dialogue.name: TALK
dialogue.text: Textless

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!
